reviews.text:
Can you believe this was my FIRST time ever trying this place?? I've always wanted to and I am obsessed with bridge park so why not. 
I went for lunch & it...

Urban Meyer is located in the fun Ridge Park area. We absolutely could love coming here because there's nice shops and good areas walk around.

We came for...
We stopped in here on a Friday night to check it out. It was PACKED and over an hour wait at about 6pm, but we lucked out and found a few seats at the bar....
